data.message: Facebook I have a old Facebook acct. I can not remember my password. The bad thing is I have a different phone # also. And I know someone open a Facebook acct with my name and picture. She says she works for facebook.

replies.message: Hi Ceci. Learn how to remove an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2AGiqwF. Additionally, fake Timelines created to imitate real people are not allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be you, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2zIVcqp. -Brittany
You're welcome, Ceci. Let us know if we can help with anything else. -Brittany
Britty if I have any other problem! How can I get in touch with someone.
Thanks for asking, Ceci. You can reach out to us any time right here. -Brittany
Hey facebook ive been trying to contact you for a week now since you guys disabled an account after accusing me of being fake. please stop ignoring my comments, messages and emails..
Facebook kindly solve my problem too. Ive been contacting you 3 weeks and yet youre ignoring it
i cannot send or make a REPLY on facebook lite if he/she was Kick out on the Group Chat so please to fix this problem as soon as possible to BACK A REPLY Button on Facebooᴋ Lite
